note.p: Colonial civil servant. Entered the Admiralty, 1847; private secretary to the secretary to the Admiralty, 1849–55; private secretary to the governor of Ceylon (Sri Lanka); appointed private secretary to the governor of Madras, 1860; civil commissioner of the Seychelles, 1862–8; auditor-general of Mauritius, 1868–76.
Census office returns (Public Records Office HO107/1513/23/4)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestrylibraryedition.co.uk, accessed 9 December 2019)
